attributes.name: Red Clay Amphora
attributes.description: Sealed on top to prevent spillage and evaporation.

attributes.name: Red Clay Pot
attributes.description: The cork stopper makes this pot useful for long-term storage.

attributes.name: Red-lacquered Songbird Cage
attributes.description: This beautiful birdcage is spotlessly clean and ready for a new tenant.

attributes.name: Round Bird Cage
attributes.description: A cute wicker bird cage. Unfortunately, the bird seems to have flown away.

attributes.name: Round Earthenware Jar
attributes.description: This humble clay jar is elevated by a decorative dribble of shiny glaze.

attributes.name: Ruby Place Setting
attributes.description: In Aeternum, the soup is usually served after the main course.

attributes.name: Scholarly Scroll
attributes.description: A pirate scholar's treatise on the great Stormwall of Aeternum.

attributes.name: Seafoam Place Setting
attributes.description: Yes, it's hard to get food stains out of velvet. But this is a matter of style.

attributes.name: Sealed Scrolls
attributes.description: You were warned not to open these sealed documents until you receive the signal.

attributes.name: Sentimental Note
attributes.description: Waterstained and nearby illegible. That's all right; you committed the words to heart long ago.

attributes.name: Sentimental Silk Fans
attributes.description: A famous dancer used this pair of fans in all her performances. When she retired, she passed them down to her granddaughter.

attributes.name: Sewing Accessories
attributes.description: Sewing is one of the most practical skills any adventurer can have. No one else is going to mend your pants for you.

attributes.name: Ship's Cookware
attributes.description: A sturdy set of iron cookware is worth its weight in stolen gemstones.

attributes.name: Ship Wheel Swords Display
attributes.description: These swords aren't just for show. They're kept meticulously polished and sharpened in case of a dueling emergency.

attributes.name: Short Black Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: The pattern on this planter is reminiscent of luxurious brocade cloth.

attributes.name: Short Cream Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: The subtle shine of the gold foil on the cream-colored background invites a longer look.

attributes.name: Short Green Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: The gemstone luster of this planter is so beautiful, it doesn't even need a plant.

attributes.name: Short Iron Chain
attributes.description: You never know what kind of thing you might need to hang from your ceiling.

attributes.name: Short Red Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: This exquisite planter features a crimson overglaze with a design stenciled in silver leaf, in the traditional style.

attributes.name: Short White Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: This vibrant blue pigment is hard to source these days. This planter is truly something special.

attributes.name: Skull With Fancy Hat
attributes.description: This proud pirate swore he'd rather die than be parted from his beloved hat.

attributes.name: Small Beer Set
attributes.description: Beer provides vital nutrition and calories to sailors on long voyages. It often contains less than 1% alcohol.

attributes.name: Small Drum
attributes.description: The ancient remains of drums like this one have been unearthed all over Aeternum.

attributes.name: "Spring River" Painting
attributes.description: It is hard to tell which is nicer; the oil painting of a scenic river, or the carved and polish mahogany frame it rests within.

attributes.name: Squared Circle Twig Wreath
attributes.description: The geometry of this twig wreath is pleasing to the eye.

attributes.name: Square Earthenware Jar
attributes.description: This jar isn't much to look at, but it gets the jar job done.

attributes.name: Stacked Dishes
attributes.description: A good host always has enough plates to make sure that no one leaves hungry.

attributes.name: Storage Cage
attributes.description: Why deal with shelving when you have a perfectly good ceiling cage to store your extra stuff.

attributes.name: Sturdy Cooking Set
attributes.description: You've gained mastery over fire. Prove your dominance by using it to cook a delicious meal.

attributes.name: Summertime Wreath
attributes.description: This exuberant wreath uses dried flowers, so you can get that summertime feel even in the dead of winter.

attributes.name: Sunny Place Setting
attributes.description: Every meal you eat makes you feel a bit happier, a bit brighter when you use this place setting. I wonder why?

attributes.name: "Sunrise Over the Western Mountains" Painting
attributes.description: A placid watercolor painting in a dark wood frame. The mountains wreathed in pre-dawn mists seem to promise the fresh start of a new day.

attributes.name: Tall Black Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: This rich black vase, decorated with gold leaf, is a relic of a bygone golden age of luxury.

attributes.name: Tall Cream Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: This vase glows with an understated brilliance, like a pearl.

attributes.name: Tall Green Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: This precious vase has changed hands many times over the centuries. Now, those hands are yours. Pay no attention to the rumors that it's cursed.

attributes.name: Tall Red Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: Created in China during the Jiajing period, vases like this one are wildly popular in royal courts around the world.

attributes.name: Tall White Porcelain Vase
attributes.description: The delicate blue color of the flowers is made with cobalt ore, imported from a hot desert land.

attributes.name: Target Dummy
attributes.description: This target dummy dreamed of becoming a scarecrow, but joined the army instead.

attributes.name: Tarnished Silver Teacup
attributes.description: Comes with a matching saucer. Sit in your favorite chair and savor the perfect cup of tea.

attributes.name: Tea and Snacks China Set
attributes.description: Graciously host an afternoon tea party, or a midnight cake party. Anytime is the right time with this refined tea set.
